title: Account Reference
description: Reference to an account by seller-assigned ID or natural key. Use account_id when the buyer manages accounts (e.g., picked from list_accounts). Use the natural key (house, brand_id, operator) when the seller resolves accounts internally.

account_id.description: Seller-assigned account identifier (from sync_accounts or list_accounts)

house.description: House domain where brand.json is hosted

brand_id.description: Brand ID within the house portfolio. Required for multi-brand houses.

operator.description: Domain of the entity operating the seat. Omit if the brand operates its own seat.
